snippet: English rugby's decision not to sanction Northampton Saints for their handling of George North's concussion against Leicester has been widely criticised, with one former international branding it "a disgrace"....
lead_paragraph: English rugby's decision not to sanction Northampton Saints for their handling of George North's concussion against Leicester has been widely criticised, with one former international branding it "a disgrace".

headline.main: Former Players Criticise RFU Concussion Decision
headline.print_headline: Former Players Criticise RFU Concussion Decision
